DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effectiveness low level laser therapy interferential current 168 patient knee osteoarthritis
DOC.brief_title: Low Level Laser Therapy Interferential Current Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: History osteoarthritis knee characterize pain mild moderate intensity Radiographic evidence grade 2 3 osteoarthritis base Kellgren Lawrence radiographic entry criterion Patients knee osteoarthritis ( ) accord ACR criterion VAS 3 8 5 12 Lequesne No complaint pain joint low limb Without neurological cognitive disorder No loss sensation lower limbs No surgery knee ( ) last 6 month Pain symptoms least 6 month No infiltration ( ) knee ( ) last 4 week No use analgesic 4 hour treatment Individuals young 18 old 80 year Complaints diseases low limb , knee prosthesis / hip joint instability / surgery low limb , heart disease , uncontrolled hypertension diabetes , coagulation disorder anticoagulant therapy , pregnant woman , fibromyalgia individual perform isokinetic test difficulty perform TUG , experience abnormal sensitivity algometry
